name: Alto Tech Co., Ltd.
description: Operator of an energy management platform intended to help hotel and building owners to manage their energy consumption. The company's platform helps to reduce the use of energy by automatically adjusting the temperature, mode, and operation of the air conditioning system and also helps in collecting electricity usage data for analysis and processing, enabling hotels to save money on their electricity bills, be more energy efficient, and at the end disrupt the hospitality and energy sectors with artificial intelligence.
one_liner: Operator of an energy management platform intended to help hotel and building owners to manage their energy consumption. The company's platform helps to reduce the use of energy by automatically adjusting the temperature, mode, and operation of the air conditioning system and also helps in collecting electricity usage data for analysis and processing, enabling hotels to save money on their electricity bills, be more energy efficient, and at the end disrupt the hospitality and energy sectors with artificial intelligence.
